instructions: In the QuickTime Player app on your Mac, choose File > Save. Enter a name in the Export As field, add a tag (optional), then choose where you want to save the recording file. To save your recording to iCloud, click the Where pop-up menu, then choose QuickTime Player iCloud. See Use iCloud Drive to store documents on your Mac, iPhone, and iPad . Click Save.

On your iPhone or iPad, open the Chrome app . At the bottom right, tap More and then Settings . Tap Privacy and then Clear Browsing Data . Check Cookies, Site Data . Uncheck the other items. Tap Clear Browsing Data and then Clear Browsing Data . Tap Done .
